content: But you are not alone in this
I'm here with you,, but you are not alone !!  :'(

But you are not alone
I am here with you
Though we're far apart
You're always in my heart
No mistakes tonight Men,you have a chance at Glory, you just have to take the first step,but you are not alone #BuckeyeNation #SugarBowl2015
You got Ya fair share of admirers that call Ya phone  you try to act like it's just me but you are not alone

You are not alone
I am here with you
Though we're far apart
You're always in my heart
But you are not alone
Everyone's life is hard　But you are not alone　You keep walking toward tomorrow 【CAUSE YOU'RE ALIVE】
But you are not alone, I am here with you, Though we're far apart, You're always in my heart. But you are not alone
But you are not alone in this
@shannnonleigh12 you are beautiful and strong and can get through anything. It seems so hard right now but you are not alone. Make this year
@mandiimonsterr I know we aren't who you want to spend New Years with but you are NOT alone

@NastiaUzhva "But you are not alone
I am here with you
Though we're far apart
You're always in my heart"
For some #NewYearsEve can be alittle sad...but you are Not alone...we are all here together..and you have You..thats worth everything xxoo
@serenebutterfly you may be on your own but you are not alone! We are here with you xxxxxx here's hoping for a healthier 2015 x
Everyone's life is hard　But you are not alone　You keep walking toward tomorrow 【CAUSE YOU'RE ALIVE】
The worst feeling is feeling alone, but you are not alone, you are blessed.
teh aay jomblo ya ? but you are not alone :p @SteffyChiBi
@watevaPJ Hey I know it's not the same but you are not alone my friend.
Everyone's life is hard　But you are not alone　You keep walking toward tomorrow 【CAUSE YOU'RE ALIVE】
so you are frozen like a stone but you are not alone
@elizabethmck54 my legs are legit dead they hurt so bad but you are not alone my friend
Sometimes people leave you halfway through the world, but you are not alone.
But you are not alone. For I am here with you. Though we're far apart, you're always in my heart - Michael Jackson

Special greetings to all of you out there like me looking after loved ones over Christmas period. May never meet you but you are not alone.
